Sorry if I take a while to reply, my comp is in the proccess of dying.

::Zardus/Bloodystrike::

Zardus looks down at Feline, his hand petting her head. He sits back down on 
his seat, his hand going from her neck to her torso. He looks around, waiting 
for Skulletron to get there.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike is thrown back by Skulletron's missiles, jumping behind a panel 
when he gets to his feet.

"Hey, stop firing! We need to go see Zardus!" he yells, ducking down behind 
the console.
